ygData.subject: Re: KS tricks + Grouping for XP
ygData.msgSnippet: no, i guess it s u who doesn t understand, because it DOES matter which server ur on. on tunare, ur right, they cant do %$#! about ur ks ...  they just have
ygData.messageBody:
no, i guess it's u who doesn't understand, because it DOES matter which
server ur on. on tunare, ur right, they cant do %$#! about ur "ks"... they
just have to sit back and maybe hope to train something on u. but on RZ,
i'll just turn around and burn ya down while ur stealing my kill :) it's
called a PvP server. you'd be zoning more than fighting with that kill
stealing *%#$ pal (on RZ, our friends list consist of ppl we hunt, or ppl
who are hunting us :)

And I nvr said "ks" wouldn't work at lvl 25. I said melee (that's what i
meant by "ur little trick"... the one where one wizard casts, and one wizard
melees) won't work at lvl 25. now, go back to ur kill stealing and paltry
melee, and dont listen to what a few higher lvl (at least higher than u) ppl
have to say about melee (which is what got this thread all started).

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

ps. an advanced sorry to anybody that reads this that is offended by this
crap i wrote... my original post was to try to explain nicely that 1.) kill
stealing on RZ is not an issue, and 2.) melee at lvl 20+ is suicide for a
wizard.

-----Original Message-----
From: yur@... <yur@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 12:41 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] KS tricks + Grouping for XP


>From: yur@...
>
>
>
> Why does everyone keep telling me "come to server blah blah and see
how
>your tricks works" . I am on Tunare server and i'm gona stay here and KS
as
>long as i think its giving me more XP than doing something else. Anyways,
ppl
>on every server are just humans, some are stupid, some are smart. Some ppl
>can't do dick all about me KS their kills and some will take action. So it
>doesn't depend on which server you play on, you can always KS. On Tunare,
not a
>lot of KSer out there, i've only met 2 others who also KS on a regular
basis, so
>its pretty rare too. The more rare it is, the better actually, cuz most
ppl
>don't know how to deal with it instead of just crying how i'm taking all
the xp
>and challenge me to duals hahaha.
>
> If grouping is better for XP, i will group. I power game and want to
get a
>few lvl 50 characters before the expansion comes out. Some of you keep
saying
>"when your lvl 25, see how your KS tricks work". well if they dont fucking
>work, i won't use it !! are you stupid or something ? situations change,
you
>must adapt to gain higher XP. everything is about XP, i dont' give a shit
if KS
>or grouping is better. I just care if KS gives me more XP or not. i have
>gaiend 4 lvls in the past few days and my RL friend only gain 1 lvl. and he
>played same amount of time as i did. We were both at lvl 10 and now i am
14,
>while he is only 11. We actually grouped at lvl 10 for awhile.
>
> Even if your in a group, doesn't mean you should stop KS. I KS
anytime i
>have mana, when i'm in a group, i let the group fight and give me XP, but
while
>thats going on, i see someone else fighting then i take their kill too.
then i
>get more xp than if i was to wait for the group to med up and shit.
>
> When i get to lvl 20 and see that KS is no good, then i will stop.
Simple
>as that. If it gives no XP , why do it ??
>
>PS. if they give player bonus XP cuz they role play and make the game
better, i
>will role play as well.
>
>
>
>Re:
>come KS on RZ and u'll be eating dirt after the first cpl tricks :) I
don't
>even know if anybody knows what kill stealing is on RZ cause it just
doesn't
>happen.
>
>and if u read my post, i said it's fine to do what ur doing with melee at
>lvl 13 (hey, its actually effective up to a certain point). but once u hit
>the mid 20's and higher ur little trick just won't work. u will either
have
>to root or run... or get u a good tank and cleric (it's called a balanced
>group, something required at higher lvls :)
>
>Sinlaru Ce`alen
>Rallos Zek
>
